messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] egg allergies-thanks!!
messages.msgSnippet: Candice, Thank you!  I appreciate your info! Everyone-please forgive me for not changing the subject on the email list until now!  Thanks again for all the
messages.messageBody:
Candice,

Thank you! I appreciate your info!

Everyone-please forgive me for not changing the "subject" on the email list
until now! Thanks again for all the help!

Michelle

>From: czuniga145@...
>Reply-To: Unschooling-dotcom@onelist.com
>To: Unschooling-dotcom@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] RE:unschooling-dotcom egg
>allergies-help please!
>Date: Tue, 7 Mar 2000 12:54:19 EST
>
>In a message dated 3/7/00 12:26:19 AM Pacific Standard Time, sulan@...
>writes:
>
><< Just a hint, I've learned from experience: Breast-feed as long as you
> possibly can and seriously consider NOT vaccinating. >>
>
>Also, be aware that while breast feeding your baby can be sensitive to what
>*you* are eating. I had to give up all dairy, eggs, soy, seafood, and nuts
>while I was nursing. (That was fun:->)After those things had been
>eliminated
>from *my* diet for a few weeks my dd was fine.
>candice
